arabic.title: اه يادنيا
text: اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
الدنيا دي بتحترم بس الي عنده فلوس
اما الي يحتاجلها بتذل فيه وتدوس
اصل الحياه مدرسة ياما خدنا فيها دروس
و الدنيا حالها كدا الدنيا حالها كدا
ماشيالنا بالمعكوس
لفي بينا يادنيا دوخينا يادنيا
خدينا شمال شوية هاتينا يمين شويه
ادينا ساكتين يا دنيا
لفي بينا يادنيا مرجحينا يادنيا
ضحكتنلنا ماشي ضحكتي علينا ماشي
ادينا عايشيني ادنيا
متوهانا ومغلاباانا ومواريانا المر فيكي
تعبنا يابا علشان غلابا ماترحمينا حرام عليكي
لفي بينا يادنيا دوخينا يادنيا
خدينا شمال شوية هاتينا يمين شويه
ادينا عايشين ادنيا
اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
نازله طحن يادنيا فينا وليل نهار بلطشي
نفسي تدي بدال ماتاخدي وم ايدينا تنتشي
مظلومين كدا عيني عينك وانتي كاشفه علينا وشك
دانتي زوديتها خالص عيب عليكي بقي اختشي
كل يوم بتلاعبي فينا وتجرحينا وبافتري
دانتي حتي ممشيانا بالقلم والمسطرة
كل مابتظبط معانا ونمشي قدام خطوتين
تلفي وترجعينا الف خطوه بقي لورا
اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
اه يادنيا الله اه يادنيا الله اه دنيا الله
لفي بينا يادنيا دوخينا يادنيا
خدينا شمال شوية هاتينا يمين شويه
ادينا عايشين ادنيا

english.title: Oh, World
text: Oh world1, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
Oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
This world only respects the one who has money
But the one that needs her2, she humiliates him and tramples him
You see, life is a school that we have taken many lessons in
And this is how life goes, this is how life goes
It is going in reverse for us
Go around with us, oh world. Make us dizzy, oh world
Take us left for a bit, take us right for a bit
Here we are, silent.. oh world
Go around with us, oh world. Swing us around, oh world
You smiled to us, that's ok .. you fooled us, that's ok
Here we are, living.. Here we are
You're making us lost and poor.. You're making us taste bitterness in you
Boy have we grown weary because we are poor, have mercy on us, this is unfair of you
Go around with us, oh world. Make us dizzy, oh world
Take us left for a bit, take us right for a bit
Here we are, living.. oh world
Oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
Oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
You keep crushing us, oh world, and night and day you thrash us
You are even making us live life so meticulously3
Whenever things go well for us and we go forward two steps
You turn around and bring us a thousand steps to the back
Oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
Oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God, oh world, oh God
Go around with us, oh world. Make us dizzy, oh world
Take us left for a bit, take us right for a bit
Here we are, living.. oh world

arabic.title: بتفرج على الايام
text: لَا انَا شَايفَة ولَا سَامعَة ..... وفِي عنَيّيا الدّمُوع لَامعَة
وِبَتفَرَّج عَلى الأَيّام ..... وِهِيَّ رَايحَة مِش رَاجعَة
لَا انَا شَايفَة ولَا سَامعَة ..... وفِي عنَيّيا الدّمُوع لَامعَة
وِبَتفَرَّج عَلى الأَيّام ..... وِهِيَّ رَايحَة مِش رَاجعَة
بَخَطّي الصَّعب سُور وَرَا سُور ..... وِعَكسِ الجاذِبِيَّة بَدُوُر
وَارُوُح المِس شُعَاعِ النُّور ..... ألَاقِي الشَّمس مِش طَالعَة
إِيقَاع الحِلم نَبضُه بَطِيء ..... بَرَاح الكُون عَلِيه بِيضِيق
وِحِلمِي زَيِّ طِفل بَرِيء ..... بِتِسقَط مِن عِنِيه دَمعَه
لَا انَا شَايفَة ولَا سَامعَة ..... وفِي عنَيّيا الدّمُوع لَامعَة
وِبَتفَرَّج عَلى الأَيّام ..... وِهِيَّ رَايحَة مِش رَاجعَة
الوِحدَة حيطان مَعزُولَة ..... شَبَابِيك وِبِيبَان مَقفُولَة
الوِحدَة حيطان مَعزُولَة ..... شَبَابِيك وِبِيبَان مَقفُولَة
وِالعُمر سَاعات وِبتِنقَص ..... زَي الشَّمعَة الّي بتِخلَص
زَيِّ الوَرد ما يِنشَف مِن البَرد ..... مَا يِبقَى في وَرَقُه عُطُوُر
بَخَطّي الصَّعب سُور وَرَا سُور ..... وِعَكسِ الجاذِبِيَّة بَدُوُر
وَارُوُح المِس شُعَاعِ النُّور ..... ألَاقِي الشَّمس مِش طَالعَة
إِيقَاع الحِلم نَبضُه بَطِيء ..... بَرَاح الكُون عَلِيه بِيضِيق
وِحِلمِي زَيِّ طِفل بَرِيء ..... بِتِسقَط مِن عِنِيه دَمعَه
لَا انَا شَايفَة ولَا سَامعَة ..... وفِي عنَيّيا الدّمُوع لَامعَة
وِبَتفَرَّج عَلى الأَيّام ..... وِهِيَّ رَايحَة مِش رَاجعَة

english.title: Watching days
text: Neither do I see, nor do I hear. I'm (just), with glistening tears in (my) eyes,
watching days going their one-way path.1
Neither do I see, nor do I hear. I'm (just), with glistening tears in (my) eyes,
watching days going their one-way path.
I'm getting over obstacles one wall after the other, orbiting against gravity
And I go to touch the ray of light but find no sun has risen
Rhythm of the dream is of a slow beat. It (=the dream) is greater than to be contained is this spacious universe 2
And my dream is just like an innocent child dropping a tear from his eye
Neither do I see, nor do I hear. I'm (just), with glistening tears in (my) eyes,
watching days going their one-way path.
Solitude is isolated walls, Windows and doors. yet are closed3
Solitude is isolated walls, Windows and doors. yet are closed
One's life is hours that are passing, like candle when it is burning,
Like roses when they drying by coldness and running out of their fragrances
I'm getting over obstacles one wall after the other, orbiting against gravity
And I go to touch the ray of light but find no sun has risen
Rhythm of the dream is of a slow beat. It is greater than to be contained is this spacious universe
And my dream is just like an innocent child dropping a tear from his eye
Neither do I see, nor do I hear. I'm (just), with glistening tears in (my) eyes,
watching days going their one-way path.

arabic.title: مش مهم
text: مش مهم يقولوا عني اني سيبته وجيت عليه
هو يعني لما باعني كانوا عملوا ليا إيه
حد فيهم حس ذلي لما دمر فيا كلي واما جيه على قلبي الضعيف
ولا شالوا في مرة همي لما كان يحرق في دمي كل يوم بكلام سخيف
حَدُ فِيهم حَسْ زُلي لما دَمرَ فية كُليِ واما جايه على قلبى الضَعيفُ
ولا شالو فى مَرّه هَمّيِ لما كَان يَحّرقَ فى دَمّيِ كُل يُوم بَكلام سَخِيفٌ
كل يوم على الهموم كنت انام انا ولا اقوم احكي ايه ولا ايه
هما شافوا معايا ايه الكلام مالهوش لزوم
هم شافو معاية ايه الكلام ملهوش لزوم
مِشْ يقولو عنى إنى سبته وجيت عليه هو يعني لما بعنى كانو عملو لية ايه ؟
بيقولوا اتغير عشاني والحقيقة هو هو هما اللي شايفين اللي بره بس انا شايفة اللي جوه
مين حيضمن ليا تاني ان هو مايأذنيش لو حيتغير عشاني يا ترى بقى مين يعيش
كُل يُوم ع الهَموم كُنتْ آنا أنَامُ و أقُومَ أحّكِى إيه ولا آيه ؟

english.title: It doesn't matter
text: It doesn't matter if they said that I left him and didn't look back
where were they when he was hurting me ?
Has anyone of them felt humiliated  like me when he destroyed me ? and when he hurt my feelings ?
Has they ever cared about me when he was mean to me every single day with toxic words ?
Has anyone of them felt humiliated  like me when he destroyed me ? and when he hurt my feelings ?
Has they ever cared about me when he was mean to me every single day with toxic words ?
I was suffering everyday . morning till night . what can I say !
What did they witness ? Talking is useless now
What did they witness ? Talking is useless now
It doesn't matter if they said that I left him and didn't look back
where were they when he was hurting me ?
They said he changed for me but in fact he's the same . They only see him from outside but I know him very well
How can I be so sure that he won't hurt me anymore ? It'll take him forever to change for me
I was suffering everyday . morning till night . what can I say !
